item.title: Do-it-yourself rain bench by Second Rain
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cdg6Jwxb9bM Chris Russell Published on Dec 2, 2009 System demonstrated in the video shows how a small pond it used to store overflow, and how the rain bench diverter/ filter system works. We just built a rain harvesting system using the do-it-yourself rain bench by Second Rain. We put it in our yard about 12 feet from the Saving Rain diverter that is in the downspout on the corner of our house.
